name: ConcurrentTrainRestriction
title: Concurrent Train Restriction
author: Metacreamy
description:
Restrict amount of trains trying to reach station simultaneously by circuit network.

How to use:
- Connect train station to circuit network
- Set station behavior to Enable on condition [item=locomotive] > 0
- Pass desired trains amount in [item=locomotive] signal to station

 On [item=red-wire] station will output negated amount of trains heading here
